resources.string:
"Q: Why do all the pictures look so blurry?
" "A: To save space and loading times, we made low resolution previews of every image. They may appear blurry in the app," "but they should look fine after being set as your wallpaper. If they still look bad as your wallpaper, please send feedback" "by clicking the email icon.

"
"Q: Why are there so many ads?
" "A: We are a small business with very minimal income. The ads give us some money, but very little. We get paid extra for ad" "clicks.



"
"Have a question we didn't answer? Click the email button and send us your question and we'll reply with an answer, as well" "as add it here."
"Google won't allow donations, but that doesn't mean you can't help!"
